### Furniture

G & W Richardson furniture from Clapton, England including dining table, carver chairs, side chairs, book & display cases, side board & tables, console & leather topped occasional tables, drop leaf side table, lamp & nesting tables, modern Danish sofa & chair, Thomasville pine entertainment
center, entertainment wall unit, occasional chairs, trundle bed w/highboy dresser & mirror, oak 5 pc. bedroom set w/king bed, wrought iron glass topped w/4 chairs, oak hall tree, platform rocker, bar stools & chairs, 4x4 coffee table, headboards & highboy dressers, Lane dresser w/mirror, Kroeler sofa &
occasional chairs, Kling pine hutch, etc.

### Collectibles and Glassware

Howard Miller grandfather & Seth Thomas clocks, silver plated items, Daisy BB gun, old guitar, Barbie toys, mink furs, porcelain figures, Murano rooster, Fenton bowl, colored glass, Oriental & portrait
vases, 50s mixing bowls, Oriental hall rugs, etc.

### Household and Misc

2 Amana refrigerators, Kenmore Elite washer & dryer, Hitachi 46" tv, JVC, Toshiba, RCA & Sanyo tvs, Lenox, Teac & Sanyo stereos, pics, prints, oils, holiday items, sporting equip., etc.


### Tools, Lawn and Garden

Toro 624 snow blower, Ready 50,000 btu heater, Magna & Turbo bikes, lawn furniture & tools, yard ornaments, etc.

### Vehicle

02 GMC SLT Envoy 4x4, one owner, 114k

### Railroad Collectibles

Erie RR baseball champ trophy, oilers, Canadian Pacific lantern, Adlake locks & keys, shop torches, interior candle & passenger car lights, Dressel end of train lantern, wheel gauges, numerous photos & prints, 2D print (7'7”x24”) of locomotive, 1903 prints of elevation track rails, bill of laden prints of Halstead, PA bridge, steam generator print, Erie Lackawanna map (46”x24”), freight traffic reports, locomotive sanding facilities survey, numerous books & manuals, etc.

### Estate of

Maureen Ball & others

### Auctioneer’s Note

Partial list only. 7% sales tax will be collected. 3% Buyer's Premium waived with good check or cash. 2 rings will run simultaneously.

### Terms of sale

Cash, check or credit cards accepted.

### Open House

Sunday, October 6, 1-3 pm

Secluded A-frame home, approx. 1700 sq. ft., on approx 4.5 wooded acres with horse barn! This unique home offers 3 bedrooms(spiral steel staircase to second level) 1 bath. Very 
open concept includes living room with stone fireplace, dining area and kitchen. 
You will love the wooded winding drive to the home as well as all the wildlife. 
There are two separate fenced areas for horses as well as 3 stall horse barn & 2 
large storage sheds. Great location just east of Knox. 

### Owner

Estate of Ron Worker

$10,000.00 down day of sale! Cash, cashier’s check, credit card or personal check with letter of credit accepted. Balance due at closing. Property sold __AS IS__. All bidders must be pre-approved with financing secured for closing withing 30 days. Sale contingent upon court approval!
